name: "The Grim Grotto" - Book #11 Quiz | Snicket, Lemony | 10 Questions

questions.text: What was the password to get onto the submarine?
questions.explanation:
The world is quiet here.

	Found on the archway at the entrance of the library in "The Slippery Slope, the password lets the Baudelaires board the submarine.

questions.text: What is the name of the submarine the Baudelaires enter?
questions.explanation:
The Queequeg.

	The Queequeg is led by Captain Widdershins, his step-daughter Fiona, and Phil from "The Miserable Mill" who is now a cook.

questions.text: What type of science does Fiona like to study?
questions.explanation:
Mycology.

	Fiona tells Klaus she studies Mycology which is the study of Mushrooms and Fungi.  She has many books about the topic in her room.

A mushroom.

	Medusiod Mycelium is a mushroom that releases poisonous spores when it's in full bloom.  The spores can kill a person in one hour.

questions.text: What shape is Count Olaf's submarine on the sonar detector?
questions.explanation:
An eye.

	The well-known eye we've come to recognize since "The Bad Beginning" makes its appearance on the sonar detector of the Queequeg.

questions.text: What is the name of Count Olaf's submarine?
questions.explanation:
The Carmelita.

	Esmé and Olaf had taken a liking to the obnoxious brat from "The Austere Academy" in "The Slippery Slope", and they took her on their rampage.  They name the Carmelita after her.

questions.text: Which person is poisoned by the Medusoid Mycelium?
questions.explanation:
Sunny.

	After spores of the Medusoid Mycelium enter her helmet, Sunny is kept in quarantine while the other Baudelaires and Fiona try to discover an antidote.

questions.text: What is the antidote of Medusoid Mycelium?
questions.explanation:
Horseradish.

	A newspaper article said that studies were held at Lousy Lane which was the road the Baudelaires lived on in "The Reptile Room", and they remembered the area smelled like horseradish.

questions.text: When the unpoisoned people can't find the antidote, what do they use as a replacement?
questions.explanation:
Wasabi.

	After asking Sunny if there could be a substitute for horseradish, she says wasabi would do.  Luckily, the Baudelaires found wasabi in the grotto and Sunny was cured.

Briny Beach.

	This book ends exactly where our story began.  Mr. Poe appears, but the children discover that they mustn't go with him.  They must go with Kit Snicket.
